alert.note: Alert for Kootenai, Cabinet Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 17 at 7:24PM MST until December 20 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches in the valleys, 8 to 16 inches in the Purcell Mountains, and 18 to 30 inches in the Cabinet Mountains. Ice accumulations of a light glaze possible. * WHERE...Highway 2 Kalispell to Idaho border, Highway 37 Eureka to Libby, Highway 56 Bull Lake Road, and Highway 93 Eureka to Whitefish. * WHEN...From Saturday morning through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
